00020 
00021 #include "calvin_files/converters/cel/src/CELFileConverterErrorCode.h"
00022 //
00023 
00024 /*
00025  * Return an error message for each error type.
00026  */
00027 std::string affymetrix_cel_converter::CELFileConverterErrorMessage(CELFileConverterErrorCode code)
00028 {
00029         std::string error="";
00030         switch (code)
00031         {
00032         case NoConversionError:
00033                 error = "";
00034                 break;
00035 
00036         case InvalidConversionInputs:
00037                 error = "The inputs are invalid.";
00038                 break;
00039 
00040         case FileDoesNotExist:
00041                 error = "The input file does not exist.";
00042                 break;
00043 
00044         case UnableToOpenCelFile:
00045                 error = "Unable to open the input CEL file.";
00046                 break;
00047 
00048         case InvalidCelFileFormat:
00049                 error = "The input CEL file is not a CEL compatible with the converter.";
00050                 break;
00051 
00052         case UnableToRenameInputFile:
00053                 error = "Unable to rename the input file before the conversion process.";
00054                 break;
00055 
00056         case UnableToWriteTheFile:
00057                 error = "Unable to write the output file.";
00058                 break;
00059 
00060     case UnableToMixConversionOptionsAndNoFormatChange:
00061                 error = "Unable to mix conversion options with no file format change.";
00062                 break;
00063 
00064     case UnableToCopyFile:
00065                 error = "Unable to copy file.";
00066                 break;
00067 
00068     case UnableToParseDatHeader:
00069                 error = "Unable to parse DAT header.";
00070                 break;
00071 
00072         default:
00073                 error = "";
00074                 break;
00075         }
00076         return error;
00077 
00078 }
